no.woact.mikand.ticTacToe.models.game

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.woact.mikand.ticTacToe.models.game.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener

    public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Created by Anders Mikkelsen on 09.02.15. This class controls the actual flow of the game and is initialized from the Game class.
    Version:
    09.02.15
    Author:
    anders

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        This method receives clickevent on all squares on the gameboard. It will then set the approriate .png for that square according to the current player. So you can select the correct one before pressing done.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - View

      • checkForWinner

        private boolean checkForWinner()
        This method checks all possible variants for winning for both players and returns the result. Only checks the row, column and diagonal that is relevant.
        Returns:
        boolean
